name: Metamorphosis
description: How many times have you avoided mirrors to escape your reflection? How often do you apply layers of concealer to hide freckles, pimples, or dark circles because you think they stand out too much? Have you tried extreme diets because someone said your body is not skinny or beautiful enough? Do you feel anxious about people staring at you in public? I do, and many others face the same struggles. These insecurities burden us throughout our lives, making self-love difficult. This series of photographs represents the significance of self-love and acceptance and is a collection of stories trapped inside each frame. Each picture has its own story and holds a deep soul. Everyone can find themselves in my photographs, each interpreted uniquely. The project's core idea is to share stories of body insecurities, anxiety, and societal pressures. Some photos include doodling to highlight their message, making them even more engaging for the audience.

photo_objects.name: Every day is Doomsday
photo_objects.description: Doomsday is a day of final judgment. "I always feel like, somebody's watching me, and I have no privacy."

photo_objects.name: Osteotomy
photo_objects.description: Osteotomy is a surgical procedure that involves cutting bone (and sometimes adding bone tissue) to reshape or realign your bones.

photo_objects.name: Stardosis
photo_objects.description: Lordosis is an exaggerated inward curve of the spine that typically affects the lower back. Moles are small stars on people's skin that create constellations.

photo_objects.name: Kernel panic
photo_objects.description: Kernel Panic is a safety measure taken by an operating system's kernel upon detecting an internal fatal error in which either it is unable to safely recover or continuing to run the system would have a higher risk.

photo_objects.name: Rollercoaster: A Guide to Type-one Diabetes
photo_objects.description: Red: Low sugar. Green: Normal sugar. Yellow: A bit high. Orange: High.

photo_objects.name: Hide-and-Seek
photo_objects.description: Hide-and-Seek is a popular game in which the players hide their bodies, while others seek and tell negative comments about it.

photo_objects.name: Caged in Judgement
photo_objects.description: Judgement is the process of others forming a negative opinion while limiting and scaring others based on their appearance.

photo_objects.name: Sunflower Fields
photo_objects.description: Freckles are small sunflowers that grow on people's skin and can be planted or grown on their own.

photo_objects.name: Blooming season
photo_objects.description: Blooming is the process when the person is still growing and glowing despite a stranger's opinions about what should be done for the hair to grow.

photo_objects.name: Suere
photo_objects.description: Suere is a verb in Latin that means "to sew, stitch, or tack together", and to heal and grow out of the negative memories and traumatic past.

photo_objects.name: Ready, Steady, Pop!
photo_objects.description: Pop is an explosive sound that comes after puncturing the cheeks when they are as big as balloons.

photo_objects.name: Luminous Whispers
photo_objects.description: Teeth are complex, bony enamel-coated structures in the jaws that have various shapes, gift wide honest smiles, and carry unique history and stories of individuality and unseen beauty.

name: Unlabeled
description: A collection of photographs gathered from various projects, yet to be classified. Each image stands on its own, waiting for its story to be told.
